item.description: The owl opens a secret level if the player has found the hazelnut.

field.name: owl.level
field.description: The name of the level to push.

field.name: owl.speech.want_an_hazelnut
field.description: A sentence to explain that the owl wants its lucky hazelnut.
field.default_value: I want my lucky hazelnut back.

field.name: owl.speech.happy
field.description: A sentence to show that the owl is happy to see that the player found his hazelnut.
field.default_value: So you found my lucky hazelnut!

field.name: owl.speech.other_player
field.description: A sentence to explain that the other player must be here too.

field.name: owl.speech.already_have
field.description: A sentence to say that the owl already has his hazelnut.
field.default_value: You already gave me my lucky hazelnut. Stop bothering me!

field.name: owl.speech.bye
field.description: The last sentence, said before pushing the level.

field.name: owl.speech.receive_hazelnut
field.description: The sentence said when receiving the hazelnut.
field.default_value: I've been looking all over for it!
